introduction: I share full‑stack web‑development insights—architecture, performance and best practices. My current focus is TypeScript, yet you’ll find tips and lessons across many technologies.
buy_me_a_coffee_description: If you’d like, you can support my work with an optional donation. Your contribution allows me to invest more time in research, writing, and continually improving the quality of what I share. Thank you so much for considering a boost to this project!
buy_me_a_coffee_title: Did you like what you read?
